entries.name: max_age
entries.desc: The maximum age of the cookie

entries.name: new(name, value)
entries.desc: Creates a new cookie with the given name and value

entries.name: parse(str)
entries.desc: Parses a Cookie field sent from the user-agent.  Returns an array of cookies.

entries.name: expires()
entries.desc: Retrieves the expiration time as a Time

entries.name: expires=(t)
entries.desc: Sets the cookie expiration to the time t.  The expiration time may be a false value to disable expiration or a Time or HTTP format time string to set the expiration date.

entries.name: to_s()
entries.desc: The cookie string suitable for use in an HTTP header
